remarks: Closure of subspace join for ` DVecH ` vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2014.)
statement:
djhcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djhcl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhcl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhcl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
djhcl.j $e |- .\/ = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhcl $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X C_ V /\ Y C_ V ) ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) e. ran I ) $.
